E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of Cristian Caudillo
Dear Sir,
Cristian Caudillo has an AVG of .240 at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Timothy Drain
Dear Sir,
Timothy Drain has nothing more to prove at A Ft. Myers Miracle!
He has an AVG of .386 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/5/1985
Subject: Progress of Garrett Mayo
Dear Sir,
Garrett Mayo has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .327 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/10/1985
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Walter Gonzalas



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1985
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Tony Villalon



Date: Monday, 5/19/1985
Subject: Progress of Joshua Scott
Dear Sir,
Joshua Scott has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an ERA of 3.21 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 5/24/1985
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Joe Gedeon



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1985
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Harold Cantara



Date: Monday, 5/26/1985
Subject: Progress of Edwin Benedetti
Dear Sir,
Edwin Benedetti has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an ERA of 1.59 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/14/1985
Subject: Cristian Caudillo healing process
Cristian Caudillo is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/30/1985
Subject: Erasmo Perez injured
Hello Manager,
looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Pulled Calf Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 2-3 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor
